div.div: ADCYAP1 allele length within sub-species groups.
div.p: ADCYAP1 allele length did not differ between populations within the sub-species for which we have multiple sampling locations. Shown are means and standard errors for Oregon juncos listed by breeding grounds (panel A) and slate-colored juncos listed by wintering grounds (panel B). Population migration scores are shown in parentheses with higher numbers indicating populations that migrate longer distances (see Table 1 for more details).
